pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake 2201.7.3 Swan Lake 2201.7.4 is the fourth patch release of Ballerina 2201.7.0 (Swan Lake Update 7) and it includes a few security improvements. ## Update Ballerina Update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.7.4 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/) as follows. 1. Run `bal update` to get the latest version of the Update Tool. 2. Run `bal dist pull 2201.7.4` to update to this latest distribution. ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, then, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install.
